Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff

Class PatchDiff

java.lang.Object
org.variantsync.diffdetective.diff.PatchDiff
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiffTreeSource, GitPatch, TextBasedDiff
public class PatchDiff extends Object implements GitPatch
Data class containing information about a single patch (i.e., the differences in a single file). Contains a DiffTree of the patch.
Author:
SÃ¶ren Viegener, Paul Bittner

  • Constructor Details

    • PatchDiff

      public PatchDiff​(CommitDiff commitDiff, org.eclipse.jgit.diff.DiffEntry diffEntry, String fullDiff, DiffTree diffTree)
      Creates a new PatchDiff.
      Parameters:
      commitDiff - The changes of a commit this patch belongs to.
      diffEntry - The diff entry from jgit from which this PatchDiff was produced.
      fullDiff - The diff of this patch as text. Might be empty.
      diffTree - The DiffTree that describes this patch.

    • shallowClone

      public GitPatch shallowClone()
      Description copied from interface: GitPatch
      Creates a shallow clone. A shallow clone should return the very same values for the methods of this interface. Other behaviour is unspecified.
